game.name: Kitty Kitty Boing Boing: the Happy Adventure in Puzzle Garden!
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A happy kitty cat blob goes on a relaxing adventure through puzzle garden. Solve puzzles on your journey through the garden by moving blocks and other objects. Encounter fun jelly creatures and worms that inhabit the garden.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A happy kitty cat blob goes on a relaxing adventure through puzzle garden. Solve puzzles on your journey through the garden by moving blocks and other objects. Encounter fun jelly creatures and worms that inhabit the garden.

reviewHighlights.text: Pretty. i think the gameplay is very straight forwards. The level numbering scheme is pain, dont like that bid
